name: Elijah Paulman
title: Computer Science & Engineering Student

about.short: Computer Science & Engineering student at The Ohio State University (3.8 GPA) with professional experience building production systems at Amazon, London Computer Systems, and through IBM Accelerate.
about.detailed: President of Engineers for a Sustainable World leading 20+ members in green tech initiatives, and OHI/O Hackathon Program committee member. Passionate about tech-for-good: From 3D-printed IoT prototypes to exploring AI/ML applications. Actively seeking entry-level full-time software engineering positions with a strong interest in AI/ML roles and machine learning engineering.

hobbies: I enjoy playing guitar, mountain biking, skiing, kayaking, and spending time with friends and family. I also like to create cool projects on my 3D printer, and with Arduino.
